mapper.select: SELECT pm.server_port as serverPort,CONCAT(pm.client_ip, ':', pm.client_port) as lanInfo, pm.protocal as protocal FROM port_mapping pm LEFT JOIN port_pool pp on pm.server_port = pp.port WHERE pm.enable = 1 AND pm.is_online = 1 AND pp.enable = 1 UNION ALL SELECT dm.id as serverPort,dm.target_path as lanInfo, 'HTTP' as protocal FROM domain_mapping dm LEFT JOIN license l on dm.license_id = l.`id` WHERE dm.enable = 1 AND l.is_online = 1
